actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase to $25,000,000 the maximum amount of qualified small issue bonds which may be issued for facilities to be used be related principal users.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase (from $10 million to $25 million) the amount of tax-exempt qualified small issue bonds permitted for facilities to be used by related principal users.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase to $25,000,000 the maximum amount of qualified small issue bonds which may be issued for facilities to be used be related principal users.
